text: Okruzhnaya () is a station on the Lyublinsko–Dmitrovskaya line of the Moscow Metro between Petrovsko-Razumovskaya and Verkhniye Likhobory. The extension of the Lyublinsko–Dmitrovskaya line between Petrovsko-Razumovskaya and Seligerskaya, including Okruzhnaya opened on 22 March 2018. The station is in Timiryazevsky District of Moscow, at the intersection of Lokomotivny Lane and Tretiy Nizhnelikhoborsky Lane. ==Transfers== Transfers to the Okruzhnaya station of the Moscow Central Circle and to the Okruzhnaya railway station of D1 available. ==References== Category:Moscow Metro stations Category:Lyublinsko-Dmitrovskaya Line Category:Railway stations in Russia opened in 2018 Category:Railway stations located underground in Russia
title: Okruzhnaya (Lyublinsko–Dmitrovskaya line)
